review: I don‚Äôt really vibe with the affirmations that say ‚Äúone day I‚Äôll feel happiness again‚Äù it implies I‚Äôm not currently happy and that right now I‚Äôm just miserable when that‚Äôs not the case. I don‚Äôt vibe with it because I already feel fine, so I think focusing on more gratitude is better. ‚ÄúI am able to achieve happiness despite any challenges‚Äù would be a better statement. It‚Äôs true, it‚Äôs encouraging, and doesn‚Äôt imply that today i feel sad and that ‚ÄúONE DAY‚Äù (in the future..?) I‚Äôll feel happy again.
title: Some of the affs.. are weird
App_Name: I am Daily Affirmations

review:
Mental Health is very important to me, as it should be important to everyone. Whether you are going through many challenges in your life or you need a boost of confidence, this app is perfect for you! Everyday this app reminds me to love myself in someway and will help me think about my actions/emotions. Personally this app helps me think about my life through a different lens. Just remember, you are perfect the way you are and don‚Äôt give up on yourself because I promise it will get better!Don‚Äôt trust the rating...

I must confess: I am the Monkey Taps  ‚ÄúJunkie‚Äù!

Everything they have produced- I am a Member of.

The obviously 10-Stars Masterpiece has been unjustly ‚Äúbranded‚Äù as 4.9!!!
The most supportive content, the OUTSTANDING INTERFACE, the categories, the reminders- all are absolutely phenomenal!

Having a tough time? 
Has the COVID-19 breached your mental fortress?
Has the boss who laid you off shown no remorse?? 

Ffff...orget about all of the troubles!

This app is the proverbial pair of wings that was born to  lift you up high, way above the challenges of life!

Take a few sips of Purest Inspiration every morning!

You will NEVER REGRET becoming a Member!

P. S.  Have you ever received a response from the developers within the 5 minutes  after the initial contact ?
These guys are even better (faster)!

To the Developers:
Stunningly well done!  Bravo! Thanks!!!I love this app and it‚Äôs subtle reminders that help boost self confidence. I find it key for this year and the challenges I‚Äôm working through. After each notification I think about how I am each of those reminders and truly helps!

review: I got this app because I thought I‚Äôd would be uplifting to get affirmations throughout the day. You can adjust in settings how often you get affirmations, but it doesn‚Äôt work. Some days I get zero affirmations, some days I get 3, some days I get the same 3 affirmations. In any given week I see the same affirmation multiple times. It would be better to write up 20 of your own affirmations and read them at different points in the week - this app is it reliable and there is no variation in the affirmations. What a waste.Taking a name and adding it to the bottom of affirmations that begin with ‚ÄúI‚Äù ruins the points. Obviously someone writes these so I am assuming it‚Äôs whoever the author is. But it‚Äôs incredibly distracting and isn‚Äôt worth paying for premium to have it there. No idea why this change was made or if there‚Äôs any user who could even want this!
title: Don‚Äôt waste your moneyWhy does the ios16 update add a random name to the bottom of the affirmations ???
App_Name: I am Daily AffirmationsI am Daily Affirmations

review: I really enjoyed using this app to get a daily affirmation in the morning. I wanted to get multiple reminders throughout the day and more categories so I started the trial. Supposedly I set the number too high and they can only schedule 60 at a time which means you have to open the app after 60 to get more. But I open the app multiple times a day and it never schedules more. I can‚Äôt even get it to schedule 12 to come consistently. I‚Äôll get two (after I‚Äôve opened the app) and then not hear from it again even when I open it which I see them saying in responses here will fix the problem. I‚Äôm really glad I discovered this problem during my trial and not after I‚Äôd paid for it. There are other apps (whose price points aren‚Äôt as good‚ÄîI‚Äôll admit) who can deliver consistently throughout the day, so I don‚Äôt understand why this one can‚Äôt.
title: Reminders don‚Äôt work
App_Name: I am Daily Affirmations

developerResponse: {'id': 36686461, 'body': 'Wow, thanks for the great review! It means so much to us. We appreciate you!\n', 'modified': '2023-05-23T14:22:35Z'}{'id': 19303052, 'body': 'This review made our day! Thank you so much for sharing your experience with us.\n', 'modified': '2020-11-23T21:41:06Z'}
review: I have tried several personal growth, meditation, and inspiration apps. This is by far the best and the only one that stuck with my for more than a week. I rarely pay for the years subscription for anything but this made a difference in my life and my days and the way that it customized to your needs like how many days you would like positive reminders or affirmation and at what points of the day you may need them most. The chime for the alert when a positive message comes in is like ‚Äúcalm technology‚Äù it‚Äôs a sweet peaceful chime that you learn to recognize and instead of being another overwhelming alert text or marketing thing you feel a sense of comfort and joy when that sound come it. It reminds you to be more present in the moment and your day. So many time a message came in with just the right thing that I needed to read at a moment I truly needed it. Even my daughter recognizes the positive sound and how it uplifts me to receive them. I highly recommend this to anyone but especially to those with any PTSD, chronic pain, anxiety, depression. It makes a difference. At least it does for me.I‚Äôve been a fan of this app for quite awhile now, but the recent addition of the widget has bumped it straight to the top of my favorites. I have the widget parked right on my primary screen, so every time I open my phone there is a wonderful affirmation. Other things I love about this app: the ability to choose themes, and edit them as desired, as well as the ability to choose focus points of the affirmations. Top notch! Thank you for making our lives a little bit better.
title: A little edge on your best lifeMaybe the Best App on My Phone
App_Name: I am Daily AffirmationsI am Daily Affirmations

developerResponse:
{'id': 34664570, 'body': "Hi there! We‚Äôre sorry to hear you‚Äôve had some issues with the app.

1) If you go to Settings > General > Help, you can tap on either Suggest Improvements or Report a bug or problem to contact us. 

2) Our development team is currently working on resolving this. 

3) You can add specific words (i.e. Universe, God, or anything else that feels too spiritual) to your Forbidden Words list, so that those affirmations won't show up. 

If you have any others issues or questions, please contact us at hello@monkeytaps.app so we can work with you to resolve them.

review:
I have never selected the Pregnancy or Parenting affirmations, not for Reminders or Widgets, and I keep getting all these beautiful affirmations about giving birth and having a healthy baby. Awesome, EXCEPT I'M NOT PREGNANT and don't plan to be.  I can only assume that this is coming from my selection of affirmations for Women? I sent emails with screenshots to their feedback address. It was like conversing with a surly teenager. I'm paid for the year, but I don't think I will be renewing. Does anybody have suggestions for a better app?1) The feedback link takes you to a page with no ability to give feedback. 
2) They added a new audio feature, but there‚Äôs no way to turn it off and it kills the audio I was already listening to when I opened the app. It also asks me if I want to use the audio feature every single time I open it.
3) I‚Äôd love an option to shut off the more spiritual/‚Äúwoo‚Äù types of affirmations.
title: Can't seem to differentiate affirmations for 'Women' from affirmations for 'Pregnancy' üôÑAnnoyances are outweighing the helpfulness
App_Name: I am Daily AffirmationsI am Daily Affirmations

review: This is a fantastic and beautiful app that worked great for me for about a week‚Ä¶ until I updated it. Now the maker has put ads for their other apps in the list of affirmations, so you‚Äôll see ads while scrolling through the affirmations. I am looking at other apps with the same functionality to see about getting a refund as I don‚Äôt think there should be ads at all once you‚Äôve purchased an app for a year. I notified support and they basically said ‚Äúthanks for the feedback.‚Äù
title: Ads in the app after update on premium
App_Name: I am Daily Affirmations

developerResponse: {'id': 32961965, 'body': "We're glad our app has been able to lift your spirits. Is there something we can do to get 5 stars? Please let us know at hello@monkeytaps.app.", 'modified': '2022-11-03T22:15:31Z'}
review:
I‚Äôm in the midst of a divorce. The relationship has been both physically and emotionally emotionally abusive. I have been quite depressed and working hard to boost myself back up. I downloaded the app on a whim and I didn‚Äôt expect much. The Lock Screen notifications and widgets have truly lifted my day sometimes. 

I put a big widget on my main page of apps   I thought the messages would be corny. However they have been uplifting in a way I didn‚Äôt expect.   Seeing those positive statements after so many years of negative feedback is helping me. I read the messages that tell me I am worthy of happiness and peace and it nearly brings me to tears. 

I want to rate this app five stars. I‚Äôm only holding back because a lot of the affirmations were written by the same person and they didn‚Äôt have much depth. I also had a hard time figuring out the widgets. However the quality of the affirmations has improved. It is making me feel better and reclaim my value as a person. andI can‚Äôt find a ‚Äúfeedback‚Äù slot, so I‚Äôm putting it here. I‚Äôd really appreciate if the affirmations came one clause at a time. I don‚Äôt take in the message if I can‚Äôt understand it. Thanks. 

(Additionally, If I disagree with one part of the statement connected by ‚Äúand‚Äú then I will disagree with the whole statement) 

Otherwise, I‚Äôve kept it on my phone this long so!
title: Surprisingly Improves My DayI use it on my lock screen
App_Name: I am Daily AffirmationsI am Daily Affirmations

review:
My friend recommended this app to me and honestly just looking at the affirmations and sayings on my lock screen sort of reminds at resets me at times. I love the fact that you can customize what they are centered around to make them more personal to you and what your are going/been though. Also the way you can like and share them on the app like a social media feed is really cool. Although I haven‚Äôt bought the premium membership the things it features are very nice and it can make the app even more personalized and self centering than it already is. I love that I can share affirmations and sayings to friends and family so it can help them out too! Truly an amazing app with and without the membership.I have been on the journey of aligning how I use my tech with my values, and it‚Äôs been absolutely amazing having I am notifications throughout the day. 

It‚Äôs the only app that I allow to send me notifications because they truly contribute to my well-being; and when I pick up the phone to go and browse social media or something else, I love having I am reminded in front of me before anything else.

I love love love this app. And such beautiful themes and affirmations are so on point! 

Interestingly, I‚Äôve been thinking about creating tiles that are not affirmations, but just notes to self that I would want to randomly come up. For example, things like: ‚Äúyour grandmother adores you, she loves it when you give her a call‚Äù. Imagine seeing this notifications and then remembering to call your grandma :) I think that would be cool.I‚Äôve actually been dealing with depression lately and haven‚Äôt been getting enough sleep, I don‚Äôt have appetite, and I feel like I‚Äôm hopeless and as a 11 year old girl says this it makes her life feel ruined so by getting I AM it has really changed my life by socializing more and opening up to people, but having my own space and it is so very inspirational because I can tell the quotes really have some taste to them.  Would definitely recommend!Trust me, best motivational app by far! I allow the app to send me multiple affirmations throughout the day (shows on my Lock Screen) I love how you can also customize the graphics (font, background, etc)I you can even share some affirmations straight to your social media stories! Don‚Äôt think about it any longer just download it right now! You wont be sorry! 

**i am not affiliated with this app, this is a real and honest review!I look forward to my affirmation notifications every day. I also like to scroll through the app whenever I‚Äôm feeling particularly down. It‚Äôs a good alternative to social media because it still has that ‚Äúscrolling feed‚Äù feel to it, but it‚Äôs a positive experience! 

Plus the app has great customization options for not only the app appearance, but the widget appearance and the app icon! I also appreciate that a majority of these customizations are free.I am a Social Worker and I heard about this app early on and wanted to check it out for myself first, before I referred people.
The App is FANTASTIC! I love that there are various topics of affirmations, I love that you can edit/change and SAVE the affirmations. I am a strong believer in affirmations and that if you continue with them, you can change your thoughts. This app is a GREAT tool to help people grow & remain committed to that process! Highly recommend!I use the banner notification for this app and set it to 8-12 affirmations each day as ‚ÄúI AM‚Äù generously pours gifts of tenderness, connection & power that feel personal and have me glowing from within! I cherish ‚ÄúI AM‚Äù and frequently recommend it! Not only that but I literally experience lovely, charismatic people recommending it to me often too! If you would like to be relevant, this app is ESSENTIAL! üíßThis app is great for staying positive. I put the reminders on my lock screen and they change throughout the day. It really helps me look on the brighter side of things and helps me stay grateful. Being a teenage girl, (17) sometimes going on social medias can really affect my mental health. But the first thing i see when i open my phone is a cute reminder. I just love this app. 10/10.I have major social anxiety and depression and sometimes I get so overwhelmed I can‚Äôt function. But having these notifications that I can set to my specific issue in that time help me breathe a little better. It‚Äôs important to give your efforts a little acknowledgement . Great app and I wish I found it sooner !This app has helped me sooo much since downloading!!! I love getting new affirmations all day ü§©!!! I share them on all my social media platforms!!! I get loads of love from them!!! 

I wish that the affirmations were present tense because that‚Äôs the key üîë Believing you are ALREADY doing or being or seeing or feeling the way you want to feel etc.I really do love this app. Majority of the time quotes come right on time to either cheer me up or just confirmation on how great things are. Sometimes I‚Äôm feeling a little down and a quote just as short as ‚Äúyou are enough ‚Äú just helps to lift my spirits especially when you are not a very social person like myself.In case yo forget, these reminders will help if you simply read them aloud. Even if you don‚Äôt believe in the lonely. Say it a few times, see where it takes you. Go for it. Replace your social media notifications with daily reminders. Through it the day even. And see what your energy becomes. It‚Äôs life changing.Just want to say I appreciate the motivation. The constant reminders are very helpful throughout the day. Especially for me being a content creator. Having Multiple social media‚Äôs it‚Äôs nice to know all I have to do is check my notification fir a positive reminder. I am a money magnet.ü§ëüß≤I don‚Äôt usually spend money on apps but this is one I‚Äôm glad I did. Every day I am surrounded by negativity on social media, work, etc. this has gone a long way in improving my self esteem and giving me more confidence. After the free trial I was sold.As a licensed clinical social worker, I look for apps to recommend to my patients/clients. This is the best affirmation app I‚Äôve seen. It is simple and not verbose. The affirmations which display throughout the day ground me. It is crucial for my mental health too!I‚Äôve only had it for a couple days, but it‚Äôs made my mornings so much better. Instead of waking up and going on social media, I go to read some affirmations. It‚Äôs a very beautiful app.I‚Äôve been testing out this app for almost six months.  I find it very useful and will be suggesting it to other members of my socialization group.  
I think this is a great help to motivating most 
Anyone but especially anyone diagnosed with low self esteem.This app is so good and I 10 out of 10 recommend it it has been helping me with my notes and helping me with my social anxiety and everythingThe continual affirmations are shifting my anxious unsettled brain to positive and calm.  As I receive them I am less prone to mindless social media visits, as I pause and meditate on each one. Much better dopamine hit than anything in SM!Somehow the affirmations and sayings are not personal enough and often miss the connection to current happenings but they always hit the spotOk love these saying I‚Äôd love if I could share them on social media but I do enjoy the app and coming up on my watch every day and making positive quotes.

review:
I was ready for this app to bring some positivity into my life. Then while using this app it asked what my gender is which is Female. (Which I thought was fine and I didn‚Äôt care) Until the very first add I got was for a Period tracking app called Flow. Flow is notoriously known for tracking a woman‚Äôs menstrual cycle and selling that information to other advertisers. I used to use this app and other advertisers still know my cycle and I constantly get ads for feminine products and baby products. 

I am- my gender is not for advertising.
title: My gender is not for advertising
App_Name: I am Daily Affirmations

review:
I‚Äôve tried several mood tracking apps over the years. I feel like they help in the beginning to identify what is happening, but over time it just felt like a regular reminder that I was down and at a certain point that stops being helpful. I‚Äôm not severely depressed  - just another person struggling with the roller coaster of life over the last few years. We own a stressful business, separated from my wife, then later found out I had cancer. Therapy helps a bunch, but when my therapist took a break for maternity leave I was on my own and needed some help. 

I decided to try this app instead of another mood tracker, and I am so glad I did. I can customize the categories of affirmations I receive and how often they pop up. I can‚Äôt begin to describe how helpful it is to have some positive words show up on my Apple Watch just when I needed it. If I had one suggestion for the developers it would be to create a category specific to cancer patients. Most of the messages are great, but having incurable cancer means my health is literally failing so messages that remind me that I should be grateful for my health are not negative, but also not necessarily helpful. Otherwise this a great app. Very easy to set up and I hope it helps you as much as it‚Äôs helped me so far‚Ä¶
title: Try it
App_Name: I am Daily Affirmations

developerResponse: {'id': 32156000, 'body': "Hi there! We're glad you enjoy the affirmations! Unfortunately, Apple's iOS has a limit of 60 reminders on its apps. After that, they stop sending reminders until you open the app, and there's no way for us to sidestep their requirement. ", 'modified': '2022-09-21T17:42:40Z'}
review:
I love this app when it actually sends affirmations‚Ä¶but notifications always taper and stop regardless of how many alerts I have set up, and then I completely forget I even have this app for weeks or months at a time. I loved getting affirmations regularly, but I HATE having to open the app to keep them going. Part of my goal is using my phone LESS, so being coerced to engage with my phone in this way is very distracting and makes it harder for me to reach my goals. I feel like if you‚Äôve paid for the app, forced engagement shouldn‚Äôt be a thing. Just send me affirmations! That‚Äôs all I wanted 

 Edit: Well I can‚Äôt hold something against them that isn‚Äôt their fault. Love the affirmations but will have to try to adjust to keep them coming. 

 Edit 2: Yeah still having a problem with notifications even though I open the app regularly. They just stop for no apparent reason. So frustrating. 

Edit 3: I get maybe one notification every 2 weeks at this point. This app would be so great if it worked.
title: Notifications always stop
App_Name: I am Daily Affirmations

review:
I can‚Äôt tell you how many times this app has calmed me down when I didn‚Äôt know I needed it. Redirected my thinking to staying on track with my goals. Made me aware of things I hadn‚Äôt thought of before. The list goes on. I‚Äôve shared this app with my mom and she feels the exact same way as I do. I have a couple apps that are important to me to keep me on track and help me through things and this is DEFINITELY one I couldn‚Äôt go without. If you‚Äôre unsure about if this is a good app or not then let me assure you as someone who has BPD. Major Depression. Stress and Anxiety Disorder. This definitely is helpful to have in my mental health arsenal.This app is everything. I got to encourage myself and motivate myself off of the quotes. I was feeling a little down nowadays but I downloaded this app and I knew I was someone and something. I knew I was a good person. I knew I was a beautiful, brave, unique, awesome, kind, amazing, etc., and I guarantee you that if YOU download this app and YOU have been feeling down lately this app will 100% have have you feel like a butt-kicking women that knows she brave and beautiful and that someone deep down knows that you can and will achieve your goals. 10/10 recommendI don‚Äôt write reviews, but I am making an effort to do so for this app. It is phenomenal. Positive thinking only works if you practice it consistently, and this app makes you do so. The affirmations are wonderful and are customized to your current self improvement goals. The designs are even customized to your taste. 

This app has already had an amazing impact on me. I love it. It‚Äôs a boost in my mood and most of all, it‚Äôs a great way to actually put in the work and practice positive thinking through constant affirmations.I‚Äôm a currently battling Burnout while scrolling on instagram I came across this app downloaded it and willing to pay a yearly subscription. I love that I am able to add a wedge to the Lock Screen of my phone with positive reminders of who I am , while I‚Äôm here fulfilling my purpose and where I‚Äôm going while setting goals for myself. This app has been the highlight of my day and today was the first day I was introduced to it. I love this app it has help saved my life and the light inside of me. THANK YOU I AM CREATORS!!!Very pleased with the affirmations and inspirational messages. There‚Äôs lots of categories and a lot in each one. I can‚Äôt say I‚Äôve got the same one twice yet so far. I personally enjoy reading them as they come through my notifications. It‚Äôs perfect for reminding yourself of your strengths & goals. Staying positive in this world today is hard, this app def helps!Not too often in life do the planets align perfectly, but this app seems to know exactly what I need to hear during the day. It‚Äôs helped me to focus more on my goals, and to stop and take a moment no matter what I‚Äôm doing to just breathe. Get the app, get the affirmations.I recite every alert out loud. They‚Äôre beautiful and thoughtful. I feel the statements making improvements in my self confidence and strides towards my life goals. Worth the download and worth signing up for alerts.You can change the settings to your mood and timely likings 
There are different emotions to choose that you need enlightenment 
Love, mental health, happiness, goals, or more stuff like that‚Ä¶ it‚Äôs just calm and easy!For this app that provides the opportunity for me to pause in my busy, everyday lives and remind me that I deserve the space that I occupy on this earth and that dreams, goals and ambitions are what I am made of.

review: I love the idea of having a widget like this on my phone, but why the need to track my purchases, usage data, search history, and other personal data?  You‚Äôre charging for the app. People are paying to be data mined. This is just an affirmation app. I don‚Äôt understand why you need to track that data. What are you doing with it??I got the app and stopped my subscription. When I went to look at my apple purchase history it showed that they freaking charged me for a year worth subscription when I know for a fact that I didn‚Äôt click that button. They stole my money. That‚Äôs the only reason I‚Äôm giving it 1 star.

review: I used to enjoy this app. I was able to create a few of my own positive affirmations that several people enjoyed. I decided to ditch the IPhone for a while and went back to my beloved Galaxy and forgot about the app. Long story short, I have returned to the sheep herding IPhone but also rediscovered I AM ‚Ä¶ now I can‚Äôt create anything. I have watched enough ad videos for a lifetime membership at this point however I will not pay. Mental Awareness Month and I am struggling with every aspect of my life. My depression and anxiety are at an all time high and I‚Äôm not new at this game (I‚Äôm 51 so I know a thing or two). I know one of my greatest stressors is due to my illness and inability to work. Can I justify paying for an app to help me when I can‚Äôt figure out how I was able to before I had to pay? Sure I can, but not while looking at my daughter‚Äôs shoes and knowing my priority is to help her depression and anxiety by helping her not worry about shoes ‚Ä¶ so that both of us and hopefully neither of us fall into the abyss of suicidal ideation. I will miss this app, but it won‚Äôt kill me. I‚Äôll probably die tripping on a Lego.
title: Maybe I‚Äôm just tired
